wyawasthawen awahira kara athi nisa pita pita thunwana waratath 2008 warshayedi janadhipathiwaranayata idiripath wimata putin ta awasthawa nolabuni. 2008 janadhipathiwaranaya dimithri medwadew wisin jayagrahanaya karana ladi. 2011 sapthambarayedi janadhipathi dhura kala simawa wasara 4 sita 6 dakwa dirgha kirimath samaga thama thunwana waratath janadhipathiwaranayata idiripath wana bawa putin niwedanaya kaleya. 2012 janadhipathiwaranaya ohu chanda 64% k laba ganimin jayagrahanaya kaleya.

rajya wirodhiyaku lesa salaka ingrisi aanduwa ethuma pasu pasa luhubanda giya athara ee kisiwakin ethuma pasubata wuye nowe. 1915 di shri lankawe siduwu sinhala-muslim kolahalaya sambandhayen sakapita ethumata indiyawedi wasara 5 k niwasa adassiyehi randennatada sidu wu bawa apa amathaka nokala yuthuya. 1891 janawariyedi dharmapalathumage indiya gamana ethumage jiwithayata yodha jawayak jananaya kaleya.
